page.title: 12HEIGHINGTON SCHOOL
page.content: Heighington School is situated on Mill Lane and one hundred and forty pupils attend each day.There are eleven teachers and five classrooms.There are seven rooms including the dining room.The school holds an annual gala with lots of stalls. The classes go on lots of outings and their most recent one was to Wales.Emma Carr is the oldest in the school and her birthday is on September the second when she will be twelve years old. Every week the pupils have games which include hockey, rounders, softball, netball,cricket and football. After we had seen both schools we agreed that the new school was a lot nicer than the old one and of course more well equipped.
